title: Ep 386 | Phil’s Problem with America’s Love of Divorces & Jase’s Issue with Christian Hypocrisy
description:
Phil shares the intricacies of training a new duck dog, and Jase has his own take on it too. Missy learns the secret to Miss Kay’s sweet potato pie. Phil and Miss Kay have an unusually difficult time with a very common device. Jase discusses the hypocrisy of people who call out others for sinning but don't hold themselves accountable. And Phil describes his issue with America’s increasing love of divorces and the negative effect it has on families.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
